Wichita.Towne East Square: Towne East Square is an enclosed, two-story shopping mall located in the eastern section of Wichita, Kansas United States. It has 125 stores and restaurants in 1,169,167 square feet (108,619.2 m2) of gross leasable area. Dillard's, JCPenney, Sears and Von Maur are the mall's anchor stores.
